comment.author: 39839593@N00
comment._content: This appears to be the tower of the (demolished) church of St. Mary Magdalene, located on Burgate: The houses to the right have been demolished.

comment.author: 34419668@N08
comment._content:
Michiel2005: This is surely the same building as in our photo from 1929! The street has changed though... Thanks for identifying the building and posting the recent photo! :)
/Anna B.

comment.author: 11763518@N00
comment._content: This street was quite badly damaged by World War Two bombing raids, hence the changes in the buildings.

comment.author: 34419668@N08
comment._content:
Dubris: Thanks - It's always interesting to know the historical background to urban changes, even if tragic. 
/Anna B.
